in time.translation[0].definitions[0].de: before the time by which it is necessary for something to be done
in time.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Will you be able to finish it in time?
We arrived at the concert hall in good time.
in good time/in plenty of time
They ran all the way to the corner just in time to see the bus disappearing up the street.
The painting was successfully repaired in time for the opening of the exhibition.
in time.translation[0].definitions[1].de: after a certain period of time, especially after a gradual process of change and development
in time.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: He wants to see changes in the company and I am sure he will, in time.
